items.message: Flooding is possible in this area. Monitor local water levels and weather conditions. Avoid using low lying footpaths or entering areas prone to flooding. Start acting on your flood plan if you have one. Environment Agency Flood Warning Officers set the river or tidal levels that have triggered this message. During industrial action this message has been automatically issued based on rising river or tidal levels.

items.eaAreaName: Kent, South London and East Sussex
items.message:
This Flood Alert has been removed.  

The situation is improving and no further flooding is expected in this area. River levels have now fallen below the level expected to cause flooding. Further light rainfall is forecast over the next 12 hours. Remain aware of your local situation. 
We continue to monitor the situation and we will re-issue this alert/warning if necessary.
